actions.name: Super Luck
actions.description: Effect: The user's default CRIT stage is +1. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.

system.description: Effect: The user's default CRIT stage is +1. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.
